panels.description: The percentage of available CPU resources consumed.
panels.title: % CPU consumption

panels.description: The percentage of available memory resources consumed.
panels.title: % Memory consumption

panels.description: The percentage of time that the application was paused to allow the garbage collector to run.
panels.title: % Paused time

panels.description: The percentage of total process CPU utilization that was dedicated to performing garbage collections.
panels.title: % GC CPU consumption

panels.description: The average length of the thread pool's work queue. Values greater than 0 indicate a problem.
panels.title: Thread pool queue length

panels.description: The percentage of CPU utilization that was dedicated to compiling methods by the Just In Time (JIT) compiler.
panels.title: % JIT CPU consumption

panels.description: The rate of exceptions being thrown per second
panels.title: Exceptions/ sec
